title: Kansen 3: Shuto Houkai
synopsis: Four years have passed since the initial outbreak of the Unknown virus epidemic, and the terrifying plague which depopulated the Tohoku region of Japan has been reduced to a mere memory, thanks to drastic quarantine measures coupled with an effective vaccine.
staff: [['Yamamoto, Toshiyuki', ['Producer']], ['Yokoyama, Hiromi', ['Director', ' Episode Director']], ['Kinohara, Hikaru', ['Character Design']], ['Lee, Si-Min', ['Character Design', ' Animation Director']]]
